title: Everest HD Watch Face
summary: Yet another High Definition Analogic Watchface with perks.
developerAddress:
83 Roseville Road
Office 20 Suite: #99589
Leeds, West Yorkshire
LS8 5DT
description: By installing "Everest HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.Some of the options and features are:  ✔ Phone disconnection vibration ✔ Different watch vibration modes ✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock ✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modesSupported devices: ✔ Motorola Moto 360 ✔ LG G Watch ✔ LG G Watch R ✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2) ✔ Sony SmartWatch 3 ✔ Asus ZenWatchDoes NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.	Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.How to install: - Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel. - You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.If you don't see it in the carousel: - Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync. - Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQAHave an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.
descriptionHTML:
By installing "Everest HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.

Some of the options and features are:

✔ Phone disconnection vibration
✔ Different watch vibration modes
✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock
✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modes

Supported devices:
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ Asus ZenWatch

Does NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.

Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!

With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.

How to install:
- Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel.
- You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.

If you don't see it in the carousel:
- Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync.
- Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.

Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQA

Have an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.
comments: Gorgeous.  These folks make quality faces.  If I had one minor point of contention with this face, it would be the "always on" face is just slightly brighter than the normal face.  But whatever, it's beautiful regardless.  Thanks!
